SELECT E.EMPLOYEE_NO as no, E.EMPLOYEE_PASSWORD as password, E.EMPLOYEE_NAME as name, E.EMPLOYEE_CITIZEN_NO as citizenNo, E.EMPLOYEE_GENDER as gender, E.COMPANY_TEL as companyTel, E.HOME_TEL as homeTel, E.COMPANY_EMAIL as companyEmail, E.EXTERNAL_EMAIL as externalEmail, E.HOME_ZIPCODE as zipcode, E.HOME_BASIC_ADDRESS as basicAddress, E.HOME_DETAIL_ADDRESS as detailAddress, E.EMPLOYEE_HIRE_DATE as hireDate, E.EMPLOYEE_RETIREMENT_DATE as retirementDate, P.POSITION_NAME as positionName, D.DEPT_NAME as deptName FROM EMPLOYEES E, DEPARTMENTS D, POSITIONS P WHERE E.DEPT_NO = D.DEPT_NO AND E.POSITION_NO = P.POSITION_NO
and E.EMPLOYEE_NO like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
and E.EMPLOYEE_NAME like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
and D.DEPT_no in (SELECT dept_no FROM departments WHERE dept_name = #{keyword})
